alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 17 at 8:37PM AKST until January 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts of 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Winds will lead to areas of blowing and drifting snow along area roadways, possibly leading to sudden reduction in visibility.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
